sentences.english: As a result, the Ontario Lottery continued to sell scratch tickets with baited hooks.

sentences.english: Instead of secretly plundering the game, he decided to go to the Ontario Lottery and Gaming Corporation.

sentences.english: In the January-July period, Macau's gambling revenue rose 45% from a year earlier.
sentences.chinese: 今年1至7月，澳門博彩收入較去年同期增長45%。

sentences.english: A gambling tax in Hong Kong contributes significantly to government coffers.

sentences.chinese: 博彩收益沉沒和賭場人員下崗。
